subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Jordan Spieth rallied with three straight birdies, and a surge on the back nine carried him to a six-under-par 66 and a share of the lead with Jimmy Walker and Bill Haas going into the weekend at the Hero World Challenge in Nassau, Bahamas.
snippet: Jordan Spieth rallied with three straight birdies, and a surge on the back nine carried him to a six-under-par 66 and a share of the lead with Jimmy Walker and Bill Haas going into the weekend at the Hero World Challenge in Nassau, Bahamas.
